@Xythurr: Ahegao God's right.  Plus modern Western society (which has a lot of influence on Japan too) has told women that it's okay for them to cheat if their not emotionally satisfied and tacitly approves of cheating for lack of physical satisfaction as well.  If you watch a lot of "romance" movies then you may notice how many start with a couple where the woman isn't quite satisfied for whatever reason.  By the end of the story, she's dropped her boyfriend, fiance, or husband for the new guy.  In modern fiction, it's rarely portrayed as a bad thing when a woman cheats because she's being "brave and independent" to leave the old man for a new one.  With stuff like this hentai though, we're supposed to identify with the delivery guy more than the husband.  We're supposed to think "I'm alpha like that guy, not a wussy beta that can't even decide if he wants to knock-up his horny as heck wife or not."  Guilt isn't supposed to factor in because "it's the weak guy's fault."
